sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-list-subheader class="pl-3">프로그램 능력</v-list-subheader>
    <v-row class="px-3">
        <v-col cols="12" sm="4">
            <v-sheet rounded="lg">
                <BarChart />
            </v-sheet>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="12" sm="4">
            <v-sheet rounded="lg">
                <BarChart />
            </v-sheet>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="12" sm="4">
            <v-sheet rounded="lg">
                <BarChart />
            </v-sheet>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="12" sm="12">
            <v-list-subheader>업무 능력</v-list-subheader>
            <v-tabs v-model="tab" centered stacked>
                <v-tab class="mr-2" value="one">개발</v-tab>
                <v-tab class="mr-2" value="two">디자인</v-tab>
                <v-tab class="mr-2" value="three">일본어</v-tab>
            </v-tabs>
            <v-card-text>
                <v-window v-model="tab">
                    <v-window-item value="one">
                        <v-list lines="two">
                            <v-list-item v-for="item in items" :key="item.title" 
                            :title="item.title"
                            subtitle="..."></v-list-item>
                        </v-list>
                    </v-window-item>
                    <v-window-item value="two">Two</v-window-item>
                    <v-window-item value="three">Three</v-window-item>
                </v-window>
            </v-card-text>
        </v-col>
    </v-row>
</template>
<script>
import BarChart from '../views/BarChart';
export default {
    components: {
        BarChart
    },
    data: () => ({
        careerItems: [
            { title: '제이브로컴퍼니', job: '웹퍼블리셔',},
            { title: '씽크블락', job: '웹퍼블리셔 / 일본어(번역)', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
            { title: '도톤플라자(오사카)', job: '일본어(통.번역)', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
            { title: '돈키호테(오사카)', job: '일본어(통.번역)', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
            { title: '친절한형제들', job: '레크레이션강사', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
        ],
        tab: null,
    })
}
</script>
